Tacoma.Clover Park Technical College:
Clover Park Technical College (CPTC) is a community college in Lakewood, Washington, in the United States, 42 miles (68 km) south of Seattle. There is also a smaller campus located at Thun Field in Puyallup, Washington (South Hill), for Aviation Training.


== Academics ==
The main CPTC campus has an enrollment of 3,500 full-time and 18,000 part-time students.
